text: "Love Me like You Do" is a song recorded by British recording artist Ellie Goulding. It was recorded for the movie Fifty Shades of Grey. It reached number three on the US Billboard Hot 100 and on the Canadian Hot 100. It was #1 on the UK Singles Chart and the charts of several other countries. The song is an electropop song. It is the fifth song on the movie's soundtrack. It was later included on Goulding's third studio album, Delirium. The song's music video has received over 2.3 billion views on YouTube as of December 2024. ==References== Category:2015 songs Category:2010s ballads Category:Electronic music Category:Ellie Goulding songs Category:Pop ballads Category:Songs about sexuality Category:Synth-pop
title: Love Me like You Do
